Related repos

  • central hub for discovering and sharing MCP servers
  • Spec and docs for Model Context Protocol
  • visual tool for testing and debugging MCP servers
  • List of Model Context Protocol servers for DevOps tools
  • catalog of Microsoft Model Context Protocol servers for AI apps
  • GitHub MCP Server, a server for automating and interacting with GitHub APIs using the Model Context Protocol
  • TypeScript SDK for building and deploying MCP servers
  • curated list of Model Context Protocol servers and tools
